definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Because of you, I wanted to send flowers on Valentine.
sentences.chinese: 因为你，我想在情人节送花。

sentences.english: Valentine's Day gifts available for sale at Praline.
sentences.chinese: 特制情人节精美礼物，精点坊有售。

sentences.english: The Chinese Valentine's Day is on July 7th on the Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 中国情人节是农历七月七日。

sentences.english: Now he was charged with premeditated murdering, Steenkamp's shooting death valentine's day.
sentences.chinese: 现在皮斯托瑞斯被指控在情人节预谋枪杀斯廷坎普。

sentences.english: In each new system, you can see it takes on a new meaning always with respect to whatever it is not.
sentences.chinese: 在每一个新的系统里，在情人节点灯庆典上红灯表示。

sentences.english: If you're invited to a V-Day party, go.
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请你去参加情人节聚会，那就去吧。

sentences.english: Do you and Corey have any plans for Valentine’s Day this Friday?
sentences.chinese: 这星期五情人节你喝科里有计划吗？

sentences.english: It Valentine's Day HO, gimmie a big kiss.
sentences.chinese: 情人节到了，小妞快来给我个大香吻。

sentences.english: Hasn't the valentine day to, what had to deliver well, delivers antithetical couplet.
sentences.chinese: 情人节到了，没啥好送的，就送对联一副。

sentences.english: This is a Valentine from a secret admirer.
sentences.chinese: 这是一位不具名的爱慕者送来的情人节礼物。

sentences.english: China celebrates the equivalent of Valentine's Day with the Qixi Festival, this year being on August 6
Valentine's Day is a time to celebrate romance and love and kissy-face fealty.
sentences.chinese: 情人节是用来表达浪漫爱情和对爱的忠诚的节日。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I caught sight of the Valentine flowers which was a bouquet of roses and carnations given by my husband.
sentences.chinese: 我从眼角瞥见了那由玫瑰和康乃馨组成的情人节花束。

sentences.english: The whole thing comes to a head on Valentine's Day.
sentences.chinese: 整件事在情人节那天有了重要的发展。

sentences.english: Sure, we all know that Valentine's Day is a racket.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，大家都知道情人节是个骗钱的玩意儿。

definition: Qixi Festival or Double Seven Festival on the 7th day of the 7th lunar month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女[niu2 lang3 zhi1 nu:3] are allowed their annual meeting
double seven festival, evening of seventh of lunar seventh month/girls' festival/Chinese Valentine's day, when Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女 are allowed their annual meeting
Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
